text:
Zoocasa | Toronto, Canada | Full-time Onsite

https://www.zoocasa.com/

Hiring: 1 iOS Developer & 1 Front End Developer

We're a small team building the future of real estate in Canada. We've recently raised a round of funding and launched a completely overhauled product.

If interested, please send your resume to kurtis@zoocasa.com

Job descriptions can be found here: https://jobs.startupnorth.ca/jobs/580078-front-end-developer...

https://jobs.startupnorth.ca/jobs/580077-ios-developer-at-zo...
